caption:
A glossy black monitor with a rectangular shape. The tapered rim suggests it is designed for ergonomic viewing. It has a sleek, modern design with minimal visible buttons. Likely used for computer displays in office settings. Positioned on a desk alongside keyboards, mice, and other office supplies.

A possibly plastic container-type object with translucent coloring. While resembling a vase, the presence of a lid suggests it may be a storage container. Has a cylindrical body shape with a slightly wider base. Likely used for holding small items or as a decorative piece. Found on a cluttered desk with various office supplies nearby.

A metallic tool-type object, matte silver with angular grooves. Inconclusive evidence for its exact function, but it could be a specialized clamp or part of a larger assembly. Seen in an office environment near desks and computer equipment.

A glossy ceramic mug with white coloring and a rounded shape. Has a comfortable handle and flat base. Made for holding beverages. Sitting on a desk beside a keyboard and mouse in an office setting.

A possibly glass vase-type object with translucent amber coloring. Fluted body shape and water droplets on surface. Likely floral display container. Found on windowsill with plants and pruning shears nearby.
